sn21.11:1.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakappino yena bhagava tenupasankami.
sn21.11:1.3: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam mahakappinam duratova agacchantam.
sn21.11:1.5: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam bhikkhum agacchantam odatakam tanukam tunganasikan”ti?
sn21.11:1.8: Na ca sa samapatti sulabharupa ya tena bhikkhuna asamapannapubba.
sn21.11:1.9: Yassa catthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti tadanuttaram brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
sn21.11:2.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
